title: Meant to Be Alone (3C109)
text:
Set:	Realms of the Elf-lords
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Fellowship: Spot a Hobbit companion (except the Ring-bearer) to reveal a card at random from an opponent's hand. Remove (X), where X is the twilight cost of the card revealed.
Lore:	”'You are a Ring-bearer, Frodo… to bear a Ring of Power is to be alone.'”
Rarity:	C
